topic.title: Accident and Emergency Date Seen for Treatment
topic.shortdesc: Accident and Emergency Date Seen For Treatment is the date, that the PATIENT is seen by a clinical decision maker (someone who can define the management plan and discharge the PATIENT) to diagnose the problem and arrange or start definite treatment as necessary.
